reviews: We really appreciated Colin's attention to detail and care for not only our home but our experience as well. We highly recommend Colin.

As I resides in Hong Kong, it was infeasible for me to complete the deal in person during the Covid-19 pandemic. Colin closely monitored the construction progress of my purchased flat and kept me updated at all times. He also provided assistance after the completion to do the inspection for me. His effort was highly appreciated.

Nice, pleasant, knew what he was doing, and very easy going. I didn't know what I was doing as a first time buyer and he helped me through all of it, especially when I was stressing out about everything. Would absolutely recommend.

[NOT_ACTIVATED_USER] I had a lovely experience with Colin Gatward buying a presale townhome in North Vancouver. Colin understands my priorities about the right location and value of the property. I really appreciate Colin Gatward's help in helping to understand the purchase agreement between the builder and myself.

We found Colin on Rankmyagent.com and we are so glad that we did! We immediately felt like we were in good hands. We really appreciated Colin‚Äôs experience and excellent insight. He was also very responsive to our emails, calls and texts. Colin truly made our house-hunting experience a pleasant one and we are very excited for our new home.
Colin is a very professional agent. He knew what you need and got what you want. He has a very good manner and communication skill also the bargain skill definitely. Highly recommended.

Colin was very knowledgeable and professional with his approach to the selling of the condo.
everything went smooth without conflicts or suspicions.
although we didn't get to meet face to face Colin gave me a sense of trust in his work

Colin has been very thoughtful, nice and helpful during our home searching. He has great professional knowledge and experience as well as very good connections with developers, lawyers, and so on. He values his clients and is always willing to think from the clients' perspective to truly understand the need. I would recommend Colin to be the agent for anyone in need.

Colin is a very patient and professional agent that we had the pleasure of working with on our condo's sale. Being first time sellers we had little knowlegde about the process and the best approach to take but Colin was amazing and guided us step by step and was very active throughout the entire process and with his advice and expertise and we were to make a quick and happy sale. We are sure to take on his service in the future and happily recommended him to anyone who is looking for an agent.

Colin was an excellent realtor. He was very informative and catered to my every need. He helped me find my first home and negotiated the price in my favor. I would highly recommend him to anyone looking for a place.

Colin helped me with my first pre-sale purchase in the Burquitlam area. He was really great to work with and very knowledgeable about the area and industry. He gave me realistic expectations on negotiation and walked me through each step of the transaction. He also took a lot of time taking me to showings and was never rushed. He also responded promptly and patiently to my numerous questions throughout the transaction. Overall it was a great experience and I highly recommend him!

Colin was amazing. I was looking for a pre-sale within a tight budget in the Metro Vancouver area. With this being my first condo purchase, he made the process very seamless and easy to understand. He maintained contact, kept me updated with everything, and was a delight to be with. I love how he keeps his communication channels open for you and is readily available when you need him. I will surely reach out to him again for my next purchase.

Colin helped us purchase our first home. He took the time to get to know us and what we were looking for and made every effort to look for properties that actually suited us without ever being presumptuous.
Working with Colin was easy, and he made us feel comfortable through every part of the process, even when we expected it to be more stressful.
We will definitely look to Colin in the future for our next move.

[NOT_ACTIVATED_USER] Colin assisted me with a presale transaction which took 3 years end-to-end. It was my first purchase and I was quite new to the process. Colin spent the time to educate me about the process and ensure I understood my options, rights and obligations. He has checked in and supported me every step of the way, including helping with my closing. Colin is a pleasure to deal with. I highly recommend him to perspective sellers/buyers.

Colin is a great realtor ! We were so happy to have found him . We were originally looking at a condo but Colin advised us of other developments in the area we were looking at that were a lot better then what we had in mind . Colin was able to get us a unit in a building that sold out almost right away ! He‚Äôs very proactive and efficient ! Would recommend to all our family and friends ! We didn‚Äôt feel like we were buying a home through an ‚Äúagent‚Äù , we felt as if we were buying a home from a close friend . He asked all the questions and guided us through everything and we really felt like he was on our side through everything . He responded to all our emails /texts/ calls in a timely manner and never left us feeling like we were in the dark about anything . Thanks Colin !

Colin Gatward sold my condo in East Vancouver in 2020 (not under the easiest of circumstances) and I am so grateful for his advice and professionalism. He is a great listener and he negotiated a final offer that service like my husband, myself and the buyer. During some tense moments, Colin was very assuring and calm; essential in a realtor, in my opinion.He was always ready to respond to my calls and to the buyers inquiries promptly. He is honest and a straight talker. I highly recommend Colin Gatward and am definitely using his services again.

Colin managed to secure us a unit during a very hot period for pre-sales three years ago. He found us the most ideal unit in the building that was within our budget. Also, he has been on top of the followup during the three-year construction period, whilst lending us his insight on the pre-sale condo market.
I wouldn't hesitate to have him assist us again for our future searches.

Colin, is very professional. He was able to get best unit from the new project in Coquitlam. He was very patient, explained all pros and cons. As a first time buyer I wasn't familiar with the presale processes, he spent lots of time with us. Thank you.

I was thoroughly impressed with Colin's service in helping my with buy my first Condo unit. He was friendly, knowledgeable, and was always going the extra mile to get in touch with the developer to answer any of my questions & concerns. Overall impressions were that Colin was very experienced when it came to presale condos, easy to get a hold of, and very friendly. Would recommend Colin to my friends and family, and anyone looking into purchasing a presale home.

Colin did a great job for us - He is professional and listens to his clients - Colin found us exactly what we were looking for and was able to negotiate and secure our new purchase - He provides a high level of service and keeps close to his clients.

As a client from the US buying a property in Canada, Colin was indispensable and knowledgeable in aiding us through the process, facilitating every step of the way, always being available.
He helped make it a smooth and hitch-free experience. Highly recommend.
Bob De Simone
Naples, Florida
It was amazing dealing with Colin! Communication was clear and precise and the most important is he was always reachable! Every time we call he picks up!

Colin was extremely patient and welcoming! Being a first time home buyer, I was nervous. But Colin gave me amazing service! He made the whole transaction a breeze. I expected to be stressed out purchasing a home, but he made it fun! I would 100% recommend Colin to my closest friends and family!

Colin put an excellent amount of effort in finding the right home for me. I was taking my time at first not knowing what to look for, and he helped me look at different options and narrow down to the finest set of options. At first I wasn't sure if my expectations in the things I find will be too overwhelming, but Colin was patient enough to digest it all and give me the best of my options.
He responds promptly and professionally in a clear, organized, and concise manner, making it so easy to work with him.

We had an extremely positive experience working with Colin. He was prompt and professional, and guided us through the entire purchase process, from listening to want we wanted in a home and putting it into searchable terms, to keeping us on track with timelines, and answering all of our questions along the way. He was honest, generous, and genuine and fun to work with and he really put a personal touch on everything. He was a calming presence to our stress/excitement and just the right amount of pushy to make sure we didn't miss out on the purchase of our lovely new home!

I have been very happy with the way Colin has handled both the purchase and sale of the apartment for me.
He has been friendly and professional in all of our dealings. He has always kept me updated and taken the time to explain any process I was unfamiliar with. Nothing was too difficult for him to sort out. He has helped me every step of the way in the stressful process of buying and selling, making it easier to deal with.
I have found him to be a genuine and outstanding agent, willing to go the extra mile and wish there were more like him.
I have no hesitation in recommending him.

Colin made selling our rental condo very easy and actually a pleasant experience! He was great at communicating with us and our tenant. Since we live in a different city this was important. Colin was patient and never pushy, we felt he had only our best interests in mind. Thank you for your services Colin!

I have done two real estate transactions with Colin Gatward. I am very aware and appreciative of Colin Gatward's professionalism and attention to detail. Colin Gatward and I had excellent communications over the four years I have done business with him. This was especially important to me because I was living in Toronto most of the time.
I had peace of mind knowing Colin Gatward will respond to all my requests for information and dealings with the Builder. I had complete trust in his knowledge and manner of conducting his business. I am looking forward to my future real estate dealings with Colin Gatward.

I've initially enquired about a number of presales about a year ago. With the very specific criteria I have, the right projects were hard to come by, when the market was still really hot in 2018. However, Colin has been very patient with identifying the right projects for me, and continued to send me information over the past few months. Finally, a project in Vancouver westside that basically meets every criteria I was looking for came to the market, and Colin not only notified me of this project, but he was also able to negotiate a number of details that would make my purchase a lot easier. He is very professional and pleasant to work with. We were able to quickly wrap up a deal in a short few days, and I now very much look forward to the completion of the project. Thank you so much for your help, Colin! I definitely consider Colin as the top presale agent in Metro Vancouver.

Colin is the great realtor, helped out in getting a place and all documents related to it.
The place is better then what I saw in pictures with amazing views.
Really appreciate it
Thank you
Regards
Tahil
I recommend Colin Gatward. He is very approachable and helpful. I had a lovely experience with him. I would work with him without any doubt in the future.

Colin has been great throughout the process contantlu communicating with us and developers to maken it happen for us. Kept us updated on not only the properties we were interested in but also pther available options.

Colin is a knowledgeable, helpful, and supportive agent. He knows the market - both on Pender Island and in Vancouver - and advised us well on setting the initial price of our property and then on negotiation as we proceeded. Colin is thorough and prompt on all his communications. We felt that we were always fully informed. He guided us expertly but was always respectful of our decisions and participation in the process. We recommend him highly!

Colin is a very polite and confident agent. He always acted in a professional manner. I never felt pressured and was very comfortable in my association with Colin. I would not hesitate to recommend Colin to others.

Colin was recommended to me by a friend and from the moment we connected he has been impressively responsive and seemingly very knowledgeable about the industry. I always felt I was in good hands and that he knew the industry ins and outs. His communications are very clear and he is quick to clarify if I am left with any questions. He is really nice to deal with and left me feeling secure in my purchase. I highly recommend Colin.
It is too soon to tell if I will get value from my purchase but I remain optimistic.

It‚Äôs really important to deal with an expert in order to feel comfortable making a big decision to buy any property, with Collins I‚Äôm very lucky as I have received the best advice to help choose the best place for my family‚Äô

Colin was extremely professional and helpful. He took the time to get to know us, understand the properties we were interested in, and communicated with us on any leads he had. It always felt like we were his only clients with the attention and care he gave us.

Colin did a great job in finding suitable properties for us to look at, all of which came very close to our goals.
He was a pleasure to work with.

Colin helped us buy a 2 bdrm condo for our UBC student son in 2016, and his knowledge of the Marpole area and market trends really paid off. The place was perfect for our needs, and Colin's predictions about price movements were if anything a bit conservative (which is a good thing we think - lower expectations). He convinced us to spend a little bit more money than we had initially wanted, to get something that would really do well for us in every way. Our experience then convinced us to go with Colin again as agent when we sold the unit in 2018 after our son finished. Again his price prediction was (nicely) conservative. Colin was at all times professional, caring, and attentive to what we wanted, but also not afraid to give a frank opinion when we asked for it (e.g. about renovations vs return on investment). We highly recommend Colin.
Colin is truly professional and very pleasant to work with. I would highly recommend Colin for his honest insights, excellent communication and understanding the client's need.

We had the pleasure of working with Colin on a pre-sale condo. It was our first experience with him and won't be our last. Colin kept us up to date with the sales process and he was detailed on every aspect of the sale. His attention to detail and calm demeanor is definitely an asset that many realtors do not possess. He was thorough on explaining the features of the unit we were purchasing and there was never any feeling of being pressured or rushed. We have absolutely no issue referring him to our friends and family should they look to buy or sell any property.

We had a great experience working with Colin. He knew the area very well, but we also happened to know the particular area that we were looking in because we already lived there. üôÇ We found Colin online through reviews. He was professional and responded quickly whether by email or text. Also important to us was the fact that he put absolutely no pressure on us and provided information in an even-handed, non-judgmental, manner, which is indeed helpful. Moreover, he is highly attentive to detail. All in all, we recommand his service to anyone looking into buying/selling properties in Vancouver. Thanks Colin!

I loved working with Colin on the purchase of my condo in Vancouver. It‚Äôs a tight market and we were able to get what we wanted partly because Colin is so well respected in the real estate community. We were treated like VIP all the way. There is no pressure with Colin; he listens to your needs and wants. He is very professional and calm (no BS) and he works very hard for his clients. He was there to lean on and rely on at all times. Colin loves real estate and helping people and it shows in his commitment to getting the best for his clients. If you're looking for a realtor, I highly recommend Colin Gatward!

I dont like real estate agents. I never have, but I will only deal with Colin for everything in the future. He was outstanding. Knowledgeable, friendly, courteous, and thoroughly professional. Not only that, he tolerated me which is an amazing thing, because I get very short-tempered, gruff, and impatient when it comes to large purchases.
Colin's knowledge and expertise went beyond real estate, as he was able to help us get good house insurance too, since he has insurance industry experience.
Not to be too grandiose, but working with Colin was an amazing experience. You can't go wrong if you choose him as your agent.
Colin was amazing to work with and I look forward to working with him again in the near future. He was extremely professional and helpful with all my questions. He helped us find the right home!

We enjoyed searching for houses with you. We appreciate that you took us to so many as seeing the houses in person helped us make our decision. Thank you for all your patience as you were aware that I was the fussy one lol, but I'm glad that we made a decision and again thank you for all your suggestions. Couldn't do it without you. We still in business, and hoping we together encounter and strike for more properties. God Bless.
Very happy with the knowledge, professionalism and response time of Colin. Not a pushy agent by any means, and happy with the approach taken by Colin.

Colin was professional and knowledgeable through the presale process. Guided us through the contract details. Made the process flawless, giving us the piece of mind and confidence. We would recommend Colin as a realtor - friendly, thorough and reliable.
Colin was wonderful and very helpful with my purchase. He is very knowledgable and a pleasure to work with. Thank you for your help Colin.

As this was our first investment purchase, my husband and I were nervous, especially about the appointment and how much our choosen unit was going to be priced at. Colin was calm, so we were calm as he had dealt with the company before and even new the lady we dealt with! We walked into our appointment, the price was lower than we expected and within minutes, the unit we wanted was ours!! We hope this will now lead to long and happy relationship friendship with Colin in the future as we pursue our investment plans.

I contacted Colin on short notice to assist with a presale purchase. He was quick to respond, supported me through the process as a first time home buyer and made himself available when I needed him. I had a lot of questions about the purchase and the market; Colin was ready and willing to go through all of them to ensure that I was comfortable. I recommend his services and would use him again in the future. Note - negotiation was not an option for this purchase so I can't say I put his skills to the test on that front.

Colin helped us finding our first home and we had a great experience with him. He listens to you and figures out what you want and helps you to find it. It was our first experience of buying a condo in Vancouver and he helped us to classifies our priorities and clear our minds.
He was always on time.

Colin is the best! Not only does he have crazy early access to pre-sales, he is patient, knowledgeable, kind, and totally on the ball. He even texts you with answers to your questions promptly; making you feel secure and comfortable with all aspects of the buying process.
Colin was a professional and hard-working agent, specializing in the pre-construction / new-build market.

Colin is very friendly and reliable. I am the first-time buyer and have concerns regarding location, value, and neighbourhood. He is very patient and spent a lot of time with us advising the better options.
My experience has been very positive and all purchasing procedures handled promptly and professionally. I would highly recommend his services.
Expert for pre-sales!

It was a real pleasure to work with Colin in finding my and my wife's first home. His knowledge and expertise in real estate and professionalism, in addition to his unwavering determination to fully help his clients, helped temper the collective anxiety that my wife and I had with purchasing a new condo. He communicates pleasantly (in person, by phone, by e-mail etc.) and my wife and I always enjoyed our conversations with him. I would not hesitate to recommend Colin to anyone in the Metro Vancouver area requiring a realtor.

Colin Gatward and I have a great working relationship. He understands my needs and goals. I trust him. I would like to refer Colin Gatward to people who invest in real estate.
Making big decisions are stressful at the best of times. Having a knowledgeable agent is extremely important.

It was great working with Colin - He conducts his own research on Lower Mainland real estate and comes to his clients prepared - We had specific criteria that had to work for us to move forward with a purchase and Colin hit all the marks with his first recommendation - My wife and I are Industry Professionals with close to 60 years combined experience and would readily recommend Colin to our clients and colleagues.

Colin was and continues to be a very helpful realtor throughout my experience when buying my first home. He was knowledgeable about the project that I was interested in, was able to provide me with projects that fit the range and met the requirements for a home that I was looking for, and provided insight to what I didn't know about construction and building in general. He has calmed the buying jitters I had felt throughout the process and was great with communication as he was always prompt and thorough with his responses.

Colin was extremely helpful and professional throughout the whole process and helped us with any questions or concerns we had. He was very knowledgeable about various aspects of the property market and the buying procedure and walked us though each stage, he made great recommendations and gave lots of options for other services- for brokers, home insurances, notaries etc which made it much easier for us. He was always available to meet to discuss any questions or concerns !

Colin was a great help to me in finding my first home. He worker very hard at all times to find condos that were suited to my needs. I would recommend Colin's services to anyone who is looking to buy a new home.

Colin was a great help in me finding my first home. He was consistently providing multiple options and setting up viewing times whenever I was interested in a unit. I would recommend Colin to anyone who is looking for a home.

We were interested in buying a pre-sale. Colin was persistent at ensuring we were at the front of the line to be able to have choice of which unit we were interested in even prior to it being available to the public. I would definitely recommend Colin when purchasing a pre-sale.
